bundle.name: dns

description.p: This bundle installs the Domain Name Server (bind9) on your machine.

field.name: domain
field.label: Domain (myhostname)
field.description: The name of the domain used for this DNS server. For example: "snapwebsites.net"

field.name: public_ip
field.label: Public IP Address
field.description: This is the public IP address to which the DNS will assign the "A" record.

field.name: nameserver_2
field.label: Nameserver 2
field.description: Input the address of the secondary nameserver (ns2).
